definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

pinyin: yuan2 shi3 re4 dai4 yu3 lin2

sentences.english: "He'spreserved more rain forest than anyone else on Earth, " says Humes.
sentences.chinese: 修姆说，“他保护的雨林面积是世界上最大的。”

sentences.english: Flying Gecko The flying gecko lives in the Malaysian rainforest.
sentences.chinese: 飞行壁虎生活在马来西亚的雨林中。

sentences.english: Temperate rain forests get much of their water from moisture-laden ocean winds.
sentences.chinese: 温带雨林得到很多的它们的雨水从含水分的海洋风。

sentences.english: You can't be too careful when you visit the rainforest.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们要去热带雨林我们不能不特别谨严。

sentences.english: Distributing all over the world intertropical , the selva area with South America is most.
sentences.chinese: 分布在全世界的热带，以南美洲的热带雨林地区最多。

sentences.english: We are cutting down the rainforest.
It also confirms the notion that planting more trees in tropical rainforests could help slow global warming worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 而在热带雨林种更多的树则会减缓全球变暖。

sentences.english: This is one reason the corporate thuggery that is destroying the rainforests is so criminal.
sentences.chinese: 所以商业公司破坏雨林的屠杀是如此的罪恶。

sentences.english: Experience the rainforest beauty of Far North Queensland on a scenic day trip from Cairns.
sentences.chinese: 从堪恩斯出发体验昆士兰最北端的热带雨林之美。

sentences.english: Jade vine is native to the Philippines where it grows in tropical rain forests.
sentences.chinese: 绿玉藤原产地在菲律宾的热带雨林中。

sentences.english: The couple drove a truck in the tropical rain forest.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇开着一辆卡车进入了热带雨林。

sentences.english: A rainforest restoration project in southern China is engulfed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 中国南部的归还热带雨林计划遭火海吞没。

sentences.english: Aye- ayes spend their lives in rain forest trees and avoid coming down to earth.
sentences.chinese: 狐猴一辈子都生活在雨林的树上，从来不下到地上来。

sentences.english: The rainforest around our house sometimes brings forth intriguing creatures like this.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房子周围的雨林有时带来了这样有趣的生物。

sentences.english: The Brazilian rainforests around the Manos is the place to come if you want to see Army Ants on the march.
sentences.chinese: 巴西曼诺斯附近的雨林是观看兵蚁行军的最佳地点。

sentences.english: Biomass of tropical montane rain forest in Xishuangbanna of Southwest China;
sentences.chinese: 山地雨林是热带北缘季风气候的地带性森林类型。

pinyin: yuan2 shi3 re4 dai4 yu3 lin2

definition: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
